bookTitle: Peter Pan: The Story of a Lost Childhood
Plot: Unresolved childhood events can be the root of adult depression. Sharing the story of her own turbulent childhood fleeing from her communist-run native country, Kathleen Kelley-Laine shows how to recognize and overcome the residue of loss and sadness caused by events suffered in early childhood. A welcome book that also can be used as a guide for today's parents.
